mapper.select: SELECT id id, name leader_name FROM tools_mobile_leader

SELECT c.id id, c.mobile mobile, c.owner owner_id, l.name owner_name, c.user user, c.update_time update_time, t.id typeId, t.type typeName, t.brand_id brandId, t.brand brandName, c.serial serial, c.comment comment FROM tools_mobile_core c join tools_mobile_type t on c.type = t.id join tools_mobile_leader l on c.owner = l.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
